original_text: And David became greater and greater, for the Lord, the God of hosts, was with him.
korean_text: 만군의 하나님 여호와께서 함께 계시니 다윗이 점점 강성하여 가니라

sentences.original_text: And David became greater and greater
for the Lord, the God of hosts, was with him.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 만군의 주 하나님께서 그와 함께 계셨기 때문입니다.
